SELECT #{userId} AS 아이디, #{index} AS 순서
SELECT A.이름 AS counselorName, A.초기상담년도 AS registYear, A.지점 AS branch, A.취소자 AS cancelCount, A.전체참여자 AS totalParticipants, A.현진행자 AS currentProgress, 0 AS thirdStageCount, A.종료자 AS completedCount, A.중단자 AS discontinuedCount, A.성과불인정취업 AS nonApprovedEmployment, A.성과인정취업 AS approvedEmployment, A.전체취업자 AS totalEmployment, A.알선취업자 AS referralEmployment, A.나은일자리 AS betterJobCount, A.조기취업자 AS earlyEmployment, A.고용유지 AS employmentRetention, A.IAP수립1달 AS iapEstablishMonth, A.인센발생 AS incentiveOccurred, A.인센미발생 AS incentiveNotOccurred, A.평가취업률 AS evaluationEmploymentRate, A.알선취업률 AS referralEmploymentRate, A.나은일자리비율 AS betterJobRate, A.고용유지율 AS retentionRate, A.조기취업자비율 AS earlyEmploymentRate, A.취업인센티브발생율 AS incentiveOccurrenceRate FROM 진행현황 A LEFT JOIN 상담사순서 B ON B.아이디 = A.전담자_계정 WHERE A.초기상담년도 = #{year} AND A.지점 = #{branch} AND A.전담자_계정 IN
#{userId}
ORDER BY B.순서 ASC

SELECT 전담자_계정 AS counselorId, C.이름 AS counselorName, C.지점 AS branch, SUM(종료참여자) AS completedCount, SUM(전체취업자) AS totalEmployment, SUM(알선취업) AS referralEmployment, SUM([성과 인정 취업]) AS approvedEmployment, SUM([성과 불인정 취업]) AS nonApprovedEmployment, SUM(고용유지) AS employmentRetention, SUM(나은일자리) AS betterJobCount, SUM(IAP수립1달) AS iapEstablishMonth, SUM(인센발생) AS incentiveOccurred, SUM(인센미발생) AS incentiveNotOccurred, ROUND(SUM(전체취업자)*1.0/SUM(종료참여자),4) AS employmentRate, ROUND((SUM([성과 인정 취업])*1.0/SUM(종료참여자)),4) AS evaluationEmploymentRate, ROUND((SUM(알선취업)*1.0/SUM(종료참여자)),4) AS referralEmploymentRate, ROUND((SUM(나은일자리)*1.0/SUM(종료참여자)),4) AS betterJobRate, ROUND((SUM(고용유지)*1.0/SUM(종료참여자)),4) AS retentionRate, ROUND((SUM(인센발생)*1.0/SUM(종료참여자)),4) AS incentiveOccurrenceRate FROM 평가실적 B LEFT OUTER JOIN J_참여자관리_로그인정보 C ON C.아이디 = B.전담자_계정 WHERE 실제종료일 >= #{startDate} AND 실제종료일 <= GETDATE()
AND 전담자_계정 IN
#{userId}
GROUP BY 전담자_계정, C.지점, C.이름

SELECT #{userId} AS 아이디, #{index} AS 순서
SELECT 이름 counselorName, A.아이디 userID, 금일일반취업 memberTodayEmployment, 금일알선취업 memberTodayPlacement, 금주일반취업 memberToWeekEmployment, 금주알선취업 memberToWeekPlacement, 금월일반취업 memberToMonthEmployment, 금월알선취업 memberToMonthPlacement, 금년일반취업 memberToYearEmployment, 금년알선취업 memberToYearPlacement FROM J_참여자관리_로그인정보 A JOIN 상담사순서 B ON A.아이디 = B.아이디 WHERE 지점=#{branch} AND A.아이디 IN
#{userId}
ORDER BY B.순서 ASC
